notifications.title: Runtime latency elevated
notifications.message: Platform polling exceeded the target window for 3 cycles. Review recent telemetry and restart if needed.

notifications.title: Rumble clips export completed
notifications.message: The latest clips bundle has been generated and staged for publishing.

notifications.title: Admin access review required
notifications.message: A privileged account sign-in from a new network was detected. Confirm authorized access and rotate keys if needed.

notifications.title: Jobs queue backlog detected
notifications.message: Two ingestion jobs are pending past SLA. Open Jobs to inspect blocked retries.

notifications.title: Platform configuration updated
notifications.message: Discord and Kick platform settings were published to the latest config snapshot.

notifications.title: Dashboard sync complete
notifications.message: State files synchronized successfully from runtime exports.
